Important Announcements
Great water views near Downtown Charleston SC 
Enjoy Gorgeous Waterfront Views of Charleston Harbor. Our beautiful Charleston, SC hotel is conveniently located off Savannah Highway and overlooks the Ashley River. Our location is perfect for guests looking for accommodations near Charleston’s best attractions. Charleston is known for its amazing history, restaurants, and shops. We offer a shuttle service to the historic Downtown Charleston area for your comfort and convenience.
Looking to enjoy a day in the sun? Folly Beach, Sullivan’s Island and Isle of Palms are all within a short drive of our amazing downtown Charleston hotel. Be sure to visit nearby attractions such as the South Carolina Aquarium, Fort Sumter, Magnolia Plantation and Gardens, Charleston City Market, or the USS Yorktown. We are conveniently located only ten miles from the Charleston International Airport. The Holiday Inn Charleston Riverview hotel provides guests with great amenities such as an outdoor pool, 1200-sq ft meeting room, Executive Board Room, a newly renovated Fitness Center, and 24-hour Business Center. Don’t forget to grab dinner and drinks at our on-site Harborview Restaurant and Lounge, located on the top floor of this 14 story Charleston hotel. You are sure to enjoy our spectacular panoramic views of the Charleston city scape and harbor.

Contractor Rates Available!

Contact the Sales Department for discounted rates while working in the Charleston Area. We are centrally located to Downtown, James Island, Johns Island, and West Ashley.
Learn more 
Shuttle Service to Downtown Charleston SC

Hotel shuttle service to Downtown Charleston is included in your Amenity Fee & designed to eliminate the hassle of traffic and parking. Simply sit back, relax, and let our shuttle take you on a journey of discovery. The shuttle runs once every hour daily from 7:30 am to 10:30 pm so that you can explore the city at your own pace without any worries.

Parking Included

Parking is included in the Amenity Fee and is exclusively for our registered guests. You can now enjoy your stay more and worry less about parking or logistics. This is one of the many ways we endeavor to make your time with us unforgettable. We recommend booking one of our parking packages if you require long-term parking.

Harborview Restaurant and Lounge

Experience the breakfast buffet at Harborview Restaurant and Lounge, situated on the 14th floor of our hotel. Enjoy the delectable American cuisine and skillfully mixed cocktails while admiring the breathtaking views of Charleston Harbor, Downtown Charleston, and the serene Ashley River.

Outdoor Pool

Enjoy amazing views from our pool deck on the third floor. The pool is open until October 31st, 2025.

FAQs for Holiday Inn Charleston-Riverview
Does Holiday Inn Charleston-Riverview have a pool? 
Yes, Holiday Inn Charleston-Riverview has an outdoor pool.
How much is parking at Holiday Inn Charleston-Riverview? 
Complimentary parking is available at Holiday Inn Charleston-Riverview for hotel guests.
Can I bring my pet to Holiday Inn Charleston-Riverview? 
No, pets are not allowed at Holiday Inn Charleston-Riverview.
Can I cancel my booking at Holiday Inn Charleston-Riverview for a full refund? 
Always check the hotel's cancellation policy before booking a rate. Room cancellation is subject to rate booked at time of reservation and cancellation policy varies by rate.
Does Holiday Inn Charleston-Riverview have a restaurant on site? 
Holiday Inn Charleston-Riverview has 1 restaurant.
Is there a complimentary shuttle available at Holiday Inn Charleston-Riverview? 
Yes, Holiday Inn Charleston-Riverview offers a complimentary local area shuttle. Check our for more details.
Transportation page What are the check-in and check-out times for Holiday Inn Charleston-Riverview? 
Check-in at Holiday Inn Charleston-Riverview is from 3:00 PM, and check-out time is 11:00 AM. Contact the hotel directly for options available for early check-in or late check-out.
Does Holiday Inn Charleston-Riverview offer free Wi-Fi? 
Yes, the Holiday Inn Charleston-Riverview offers free WiFi!
